description:
Your memories are priceless. In the digital world Memories=Data.

The data that is stored on your computer has to be backed up somewhere .

Most of people back up their data to devices that are located on the same place as the data, which can be risky.

This is why it is recommended to backup your data to the cloud ("the internet").

This course will provide you step-by-step guides on how to Back Up Your Personal Data to Google's cloud.

All the Google tools that are covered in this course are totally free.

The lessons will guide you through the process of :
  • Opening a Google account
  • Installing the needed software
  • Using Google's cloud tools to backup your photos, documents and videos

Content and Overview

The course contains video lectures and PDF E-books that will guide you through the whole process. The video lectures contain live screenshots and a lot of explanations. The E-Books also contain the video screenshots and will assist you to progress in your own pace.

At the will of this course you will be able back up your personal photos, documents and videos to Google's cloud.
title: Backup Your Photos, Videos & Docs to Google's Cloud
